timeline.message:
Display message on empty profile list

Instead of displaying headers with empty list, show message with hints.

Refactor: Group Constants alphabetically

For readability, move constants based on alphabetically.

timeline.author: kaituo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,15 +29,15 @@ import (
 )
 
 const (
-	defaultFileType       = "yaml"
-	defaultConfigFileName = "config"
 	cliName               = "esad"
+	defaultConfigFileName = "config"
+	defaultFileType       = "yaml"
 	esadConfigFile        = "ESAD_CONFIG_FILE"
 	FlagConfig            = "config"
-	FlagUser              = "user"
-	FlagPassword          = "password"
 	FlagEndpoint          = "endpoint"
+	FlagPassword          = "password"

replies.bodyText:
generally in cli,
the action is called command eg: esad / aws-cli /  ls / git
options are called flags or parameters like "git --config" / "git checkout -b branch name ( config and b are flags/parameters)
replies.author: VijayanB

replies.bodyText: I see.  I thought there might be some special meaning.
replies.author: kaituo
